name: All Roads Lead To Sardinia
description:
This was only ever going to end one way

(Before he leaves, Risotto ruminations on the deaths of his men)

(game is best played in full screen)

At last! I can post this! This fic was a real labor of love, and I had so much fun working on it. I hope you have just as much fun playing :)Made for La Squadra Week. Go check out everything else everybody's made! (psst also I wrote a traditional fic for the horror prompt. Maybe Sprout Wings. go check it out ;D)

Here's the fic page on Ao3, if you'd like to come feed me comments and kudos over there :)

Other places you can find me
